caption.title: Strengths and limitations of this study

list-item.p: The review will cover a comprehensive time frame of 25â€…years.
Publications not restricted to any particular study type, geographical region or human health issue.
The review will cover two databases focusing on English language results.
Grey literature will not be included in the literature search but will include comments or opinion views published in peer-reviewed journals.
The quality of publications captured will not be assessed.
